name: sonetel-design-system
description: Sonetel Design System - Design tokens and Style Dictionary configuration

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-tokens
scripts.start: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 3000 -c-1 --cors
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 3000 -c-1 --cors
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build && npx concurrently "npm run watch" "npx http-server dist -p 3000 -c-1 --cors"
scripts.dev:full: npm run build && npx concurrently "npm run webhook" "npx http-server dist -p 3000 -c-1 --cors"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Build complete - ready for deployment'

author: Sonetel
